name: Punisher

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.details: Performs an evasive roll, potentially auto-reloading weapon.

abilities.name: Aim Down Sights
abilities.details: Aims down sights for increased accuracy and slightly reduced spread.

ultimate.name: War Zone
ultimate.effect: Significantly increases reload speed, fire rate, and grants unlimited ammo for ~8 seconds.
ultimate.details: Unleashes his full weapon handling expertise.

passives.name: Tactical Reload
passives.details: Slightly faster base reload speed than average.

lore: Frank Castle, a former Marine whose family was killed by the mob. He wages a brutal one-man war on crime using his military expertise and vast arsenal, employing lethal force without hesitation.

comics.title: The Punisher (various series, particularly by Ennis)
